original_text: They sold some of their own things. Then they gave that money to any believers who needed it.
korean_text: 또 재산과 소유를 팔아 각 사람의 필요를 따라 나눠 주며

sentences.original_text: They sold some of their own things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신의 것들 중 일부를 팔았습니다.

sentences.original_text: to any believers who needed it.
